text: Julian Howard Beale (10 October 1934 â€“ 3 August 2021) was an Australian businessman and politician. He was born in Sydney. He was a member of the Liberal Party. Beale was a member of the House of Representatives from 1984 until 1996. Beale died on 3 August 2021 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Politicians from Sydney
title: Julian Beale
